name: laravel-herd
title: Laravel Herd
description: Provides quick access to Laravel Herd features and settings.
author: diana_scharf

commands.name: pin-dumps
commands.title: Pin Dumps
commands.subtitle: Laravel Herd
commands.description: Pin or unpin the Dumps Window

commands.name: sites
commands.title: Sites
commands.subtitle: Laravel Herd
commands.description: Browse existing sites and create new ones.

commands.name: check-for-updates
commands.title: Check for Updates
commands.subtitle: Laravel Herd
commands.description: Checks if there's a new version of Laravel Herd availale.

commands.name: open-recent-site
commands.title: Open Recent Site
commands.subtitle: Laravel Herd
commands.description: Opens the most recent site in your browser.

commands.name: open-recent-site-database
commands.title: Open Database of Recent Site
commands.subtitle: Laravel Herd
commands.description: Opens the database of your most recent site.

commands.name: open-recent-site-tinker
commands.title: Open Recent Site in Tinker(well)
commands.subtitle: Laravel Herd
commands.description: Opens the most recent site in Tinkerwell, if installed. Otherwise, opens a tinker session in the terminal.

commands.name: open-recent-site-logs
commands.title: Open Logs for Recent Site
commands.subtitle: Laravel Herd
commands.description: Opens the Log Viewer for your most recent site.

commands.name: open-docs
commands.title: Open Documentation
commands.subtitle: Laravel Herd
commands.description: Opens the documentation for Laravel Herd.

commands.name: open-config
commands.title: Open Configuration Folder
commands.subtitle: Laravel Herd
commands.description: Opens the general configuration folder for Laravel Herd.

commands.name: refresh-caches
commands.title: Refresh Caches
commands.subtitle: Laravel Herd
commands.description: Refresh the caches for Laravel Herd.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
